abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.text: As long as Blaziken's remaining HP is 40 or less, Blaziken does 40 more damage to the Defending Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Searing Flame
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Damage Burn
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage.
